ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/DecisionLogic
CodeDisplayDefinition
The client has a history of severe allergic reactions"Potential contraindications" = "Severe allergic reactions""Potential contraindications" = "Severe allergic reactions" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Hibcontraindications * Tabs: Hib
Hib vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note."Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed""Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Hibcontraindications * Tabs: Hib
Do not vaccinate client with Hib conjugate vaccine if client has had allergic reaction or known allergies to any component of the vaccine.Do not vaccinate client with Hib conjugate vaccine if client has had allergic reaction or known allergies to any component of the vaccine.Do not vaccinate client with Hib conjugate vaccine if client has had allergic reaction or known allergies to any component of the vaccine. title.value: Decision Logic For Decision Table IMMZ.D5.DT.Hibcontraindications

description.value: Value Set for Decision Logic For Decision Table IMMZ.D5.DT.Hibcontraindications. Autogenerated from DAK artifacts

code.value: The client has a history of severe allergic reactions
Hib vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note.
Do not vaccinate client with Hib conjugate vaccine if client has had allergic reaction or known allergies to any component of the vaccine.
